name: Eloy Lost in Time
description:
Eloy Lost in Time is a little Jump and Run where you travel through dimensions and get all your Time abilitys back.

Move:

WASD / left stick

Jump:

space / south button

Look around:

mouse / right stick

Pause:

escape / start

Slow Time:

shift / north button

Time Manipulation:

Q and E/ right - left Trigger

Eloy Lost in Time was a school project wich was created within the last 6 months.

Created by
Nayu/Ben


1. Download

2. Unpack

3. Start Eloy.exe
